notes:
• Healers are mostly not supported, and currently have no developer actively working on them.
  • Most DPS specializations and items for 8.2.0 implemented, see here for more details.
  • New Blizzard API Profile character endpoints in use for armory imports. This information includes full Azerite Esseence, and "drop level" support (for certain BfA leveling items). Note that downloads for characters that have not logged in for a while (after 2019-07-02) may not successfully load until several hours have passed.
  • List of changes between 8.1.5 release 1 and 8.2.0 release 1
  • Hotfixes included up to 2019-07-16

• Healers are not supported, and currently have no developer working on them.
  • List of changes between 8.1.0 release 1 and 8.1.5 release 1
  • This version will reset the Graphical User Interface options
  • Initial support for new allied races introduced in 8.1.5.
  • Implement a basic update check mechanism to the Graphical User Interface
  • Implement support for the new Blizzard API endpoints for World of Warcraft. More information can be found here

• Healers are not supported, and currently have no developer working on them.
  • Protection Warriors are currently disabled
  • List of changes between 8.0.1 release 1 and 8.1.0 release 1
  • Hotfixes Current as of 2018-12-19
